name: TurboTerror
description:
Game
Out of gas and soon out hope, a lonely visitor stops by RabitZ Hotel for food and comfort. But everything is not as friendly and nice as it first seems..

Kurt Russel is The RabitZ in Turbo Killer - a breath taking horror story that will make your toes crawl back into Narnia.

Info
IMPORTANT: Play with headphones - sound and in a dark room for the best experience!

Controls: Move with W, A, S, D - look around using the mouse.

TurboTerror is an entry to a horror themed gamejam: https://itch.io/jam/themed-horror-game-jam-5

Made using Unreal Engine 5 and blender.

Twitter: https://twitter.com/BerryBinaries

Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCVKkBVETbk410RaOT65CnfQ

Music
- The Visitor by Shane Ivers - https://www.silvermansound.com
- Fear by David Fesliyan
